Thank you again for your feedback, and we hope you will consider giving us another chance to make a better impression in the future. Hotel Management

Summary: I am staying here for a few weeks as I am new to California and looking for a new home. I have found that the front desk customer service is exceptional. Marisella helped me out with my reservation since I was having issues with the website. She is so friendly and very accommodating. I would highly recommend this property just based off her service alone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the glowing review of Extended Stay America and for recommending us to the fellow travelers. It’s great to know you are enjoying the service provided by our courteous associates. We will be sure to share your compliments with Marisella for taking good care of you. Please enjoy the rest of your stay.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This Extended Stay is very convenient and walking distance from John Wayne Airport. The service is wonderful. My room was clean and I especially liked the hard floor, as carpets in hotel rooms can easily hide dirt. The tub though was not porcelain white, but had a light brown speckled finish instead, and it was not easy to determine whether it was clean or not. The halls and stairwells are tired with some debris. Many low life looking characters frequent the exterior and sit right outside on the curb smoking cigarettes and drinking beer. It appears they may run Section 8 housing here. I complained these people were smoking too close to the building for California law, but it would be a full time job shooing all these folks and nothing changed.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. Although you had a pleasant stay, we apologize for the cleanliness issue. Your feedback is shared with our housekeeping team to be more diligent going ahead. We hope to have another chance to deliver you with an exceptional experience.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Didn't have a very good experience here.  First, I had a free nights stay to use and was told two different things from the front desk staff on how to redeem it.  Front desk person at check-in told me I had done it wrong and couldn't honor it.  Wasn't very nice about it.   Nothing in the rooms to speak of, no coffee maker, no cups, etc.  No workout facility here.  3 of the 5 washing machines were broken and the 4th ate my quarters and required me to nag the front desk to open up the machine.  Floors are noisy, housekeeping repeatedly let the doors bang shut making it worse.  It's reasonable for the money but wouldn't recommend it overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel. Please accept our apologies for the difficulties you experienced in your room. We assure you that we have discussed your feedback with the appropriate departments, and we’re taking immediate actions to avoid such mistakes going forward. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back and provide you with a more favorable experience.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: As ESA goes, this location wasn't too bad
Summary: I have stayed at multiple ESAs before and it's always a crap-shoot; you never know what you're gonna get, even at the same location.  Let me preface my review by saying I had a co-worker stay at this location months prior and had a terrible experience. My experience was quite a bit different.  I stayed here almost 2 weeks and enjoyed my stay overall. The receptionist was friendly and I was able to get my cookware (which actually looked clean) within 3 hours of checking in.  I had a standard room and enjoyed how spacious it was. My A/C actually worked and didn't emit any strange smells. As far as things messed up in the room (there always is), I had very few problems. The shower spigot was very leaky, the microwave door was very finicky and refused to latch most of the time, and
Manager Response: Sai, thank you for your detailed review. We’re happy to know you were pleased with your spacious room and that overall you had a pleasant stay with us. However, we’re sorry for if you were inconvenienced due to the problems you mentioned. Please be assured we have shared your feedback with the concerned teams, and will use it to enhance our service and facilities. We appreciate your business and hope you will choose Extended Stay America on your next trip to Newport Beach.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Close to the airport at a reasonable rate
Summary: I stayed here while on business in the area.  It was one of the few places that had an opening for the dates I needed.  Overall, it was a nice place.  This hotel is really setup for people who are on extended stays, so the normal hotel amenities are at a minimum (no restaurant, not always someone at the front desk, etc.).  The room was nice and had everything I needed for a business stay.  There was a full kitchen, but no cookware or dinnerware unless you requested them.  The hotel is in a very commercial business type area, so there are not many restaurants or shops within walking distance.  The morning breakfast was packed granola bars and muffins with coffee.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We’re happy to know you found us to be at a fair price and that our proximity to the airport was convenient for you. However, we’re sorry for the not meeting some of your expectations. Please know, to ensure the cleanliness of kitchenware upon check-in, brand standards require us to make these items available at the front desk rather than leaving them in the suites. Hopefully, we will have the opportunity to make it up to you on a future visit.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The service was really nice. The rooms where very big. Some with even a kitchen available for a very good price. Available light morning breakfast was included.  Very close to local airport. Large front parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Extended Stay America. We are glad to know you loved each and every aspect of our hotel and that you found us to be a good value. Thanks again, and we look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary: Nutzia at the front desk made my 5 night stay the best I've had anywhere in the last 10 years. What a great employee they chose to hire. All employees should take a lesson from this intelligent gem!  Personable,knowledgeable,polite and an over all excellent choice for hire. A smile that greets you and is  genuinely ready to help your stay be the best stay possible and exceeds at doing so.  I have never written a review on an employee before basically because I havent interacted with one so delightful and deserving.   Extended Stay had the great sense to hire her and I hope she is rewarded for the excellent work ethic, job,  attitude and customwr service skills  she possesses.   And shes beautiful! Easy on the eyes  as well.😘  Thank you Nutzia for the fantastic service, great
Manager Response: Denise, thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at Extended Stay America. We agree with your remarks that Nutzia is an awesome member of our great team. Our staff works hard to create memorable experiences for every guest. We will pass on your gracious compliments, as we know that she will truly appreciate it. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Santa Ana.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We recently stayed at ESA for 5 nights and are really conflicted about the stay. Service was adequate and the lobby was nice, but the room we were in just felt gross. The drawers on the small dresser felt very sticky and were difficult to open, there was a major repair on one wall that hadn't been painted over, the curtains felt dirty- just overall felt like the room needed a deep, detailed cleaning. We booked ESA specifically for the kitchenette, however you will need to visit the front desk with a list of what utensils and dishes you would like, and what they have is extremely limited- plates, cups, utensils, spatula, dish rack, dish towels, cutting board, skillet, toaster- not much else. The kitchenette has a two burner stove, microwave and refrigerator (which opened the
Manager Response: Jenny, it was disheartening to read that we did not live up to our usual standards, and we're truly sorry your stay was less than satisfactory. We are taking appropriate steps to ensure future guests do not encounter the same issues. We hope you will accept our apologies and consider giving us another chance to show you the outstanding service that we typically provide.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Longtime Customer Appreciates This Hotel & Marisela M. Especially
Summary: I have stayed here off and on for over a year as I am in between buying a property and having to move from a complex as they tear it down and build new luxury apartments. Marisela M. is especially friendly and helpful at the counter and always very attentive to any requests for help, questions, etc. and the staff in general is also very helpful. The hotel provides great value for an area like Newport Beach but it is not a luxury hotel, it is what it is and that is an affordable and effective option with full kitchens for cooking, laundry room, and ample parking. I recommend it both for the business and family traveler.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comments regarding your recent stay at Extended Stay America. Your compliments were a pleasure to read. We're delighted to learn you were thoroughly spoiled by our team especially Marisela. We will be sure to share your fantastic compliments with her We appreciate your review and look forward to having you as our guest again.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Stayed at this facility 3 times and had no problem.
Summary: The staff is very kind and helpful, specially the front desk worker Caitlin. Made the check in smooth and always has a smile on her face. I stayed here to visit my friend and was looking for a cheap but clean place to stay. The facility provides what it says it will. Expect nothing less or nothing more. It is value for the money.  Coffee/tea and granola bars are available as breakfast, which is included in the price.
Manager Response: Metin, thanks for the feedback. We are delighted to read you were impressed with the facilities and services we offered and that you found us to be a great value. Your compliments have been shared with the entire team, especially with Caitlin for a job well-done. All of us at Extended Stay America would love to be the hotel of your choice every time you both are in the area.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Are they housing the homeless here?
Summary: After waiting in the dirty disgusting lobby to check in because nobody was there for 15 minutes I checked into my room. It was absolutely disgusting! Smelly, dark, dirty and old. I checked out the bathroom and the shower curtain rod had been yanked out of the wall about to fall on the floor. I immediately turned around, canceled my room and left. Honestly the other “guests” looked like homeless people and drug addicts and I wouldn’t be surprised if Newport was housing them there! Don’t go near this place!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We take these matters very seriously and appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Your feedback will assist us in our efforts to continually improve our service and guest experience. We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better stay in the future. Hotel Management

Summary: You will not find a better place in overall value in the Newport Beach / Irvine area! The entire staff is highly pleasant, extremely courteous, and professional. The location is perfect. A few blocks from the John Wayne airport, close to several nice restaurants, and halfway between the two major malls: South Coast Plaza and Fashion Island. I wouldn't think of being any other place in this area!  James S.
Manager Response: James, thank you for sharing your amazing experience at Extended Stay America. We are thrilled to read you loved being close to so many attractions near us and were impressed with the service provided by our courteous associates. We appreciate you sharing your nice comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: good hotel value for money , nice service, closer to santa ana airport - will be good if shuttle service is provided. will be good if cab service is provided. will be good to have basic groceries sold. Otherwise its all great.
Manager Response: Sriram, thank you for reviewing Extended Stay America. We are happy your overall experience was enjoyable, and you loved most aspects of our hotel. We appreciate your suggestions and invite you to stay with us again the next time you are in this part of the city.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: For the cost, value is not there.
Summary: Bed was hard, linens thin and pathetic, noise comes right through the walls and ceiling from room above.  It does have easy parking and the outside grounds look nice.  The hallway and common area need a major face lift.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel. Please accept our apologies for not meeting your expectations during your stay. We have a note of your feedback and will share it with the concerned teams in an effort to improve our service and facilities. We hope you will give us another chance to prove ourselves on a future visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Room clean but hotel was not!
Summary: Room was clean and comfortable. But hotel grounds we're poorly maintained. Garbage can at side enterance.was overflowing when we check in. 3 days later was still overflowing and garbage piled up all around it. Area was not cleaned and cigarette butts were everywhere. Side door needed hotel card to open but was always propped open so property not secured at all.
Manager Response: Eric, thank you for your review of your stay. We apologize for not living up to your expectations, and we appreciate you taking the time to provide specifics about the problems that inconvenienced you. We are working with our staff to make sure we are paying the proper attention to these areas. We hope you will give us another opportunity to prove we can do better on your next trip to this area.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This place did the job. I enjoyed the quick breakfast. I was a little put off by the weird scents in the hallway and the elevator. Pets are allowed in the hotel, which is fine, but I recommend throughly cleaning the area and spraying or descent the area of dander. It would be nice to have my room cleaned every 2 days rather than just 1. I was afraid to toss food in the garbage and have my space smell of it.  Other than that it was ok.
Manager Response: Lisnel, thank you for sharing your review. We are happy to read you had an overall nice stay with us and liked most aspects of our hotel. Being an extended stay we have people staying for a longer duration, and to make them feel at home, we have our housekeeping service done once in 7 days, but we always provide it on request for a minimal fee. We appreciate your business and hope to see you soon the next time you are in this area.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Faith, Meri and the other staff members are very warm and welcoming and go out of there way to make sure that you are as comfortable as possible no matter the length of your stay. I Love this Location and highly recommend anyone to stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay at Extended Stay America. It’s good to know our location perfectly suited your needs and that our attentive associate left you with a good impression of our hotel. We will be sure to share your compliments with Faith, Meri and our entire team for a job well done! Thanks again for your feedback, and we would love to welcome you back the next time you are in the area.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Hire more cleaning staff, please, and fix the door locks
Summary: I stayed here recently and paid for my room to be cleaned.    It was not cleaned for three days of a two-week stay.    My money was refunded and the front desk staff were very helpful.  I appreciate their efforts.  Still, I came back from work every night wondering if I was going to come back to a clean room or not.    The bed was hard and uncomfortable.   The door to the room didn't close all the way unless I slammed it, hard.   I do not recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Kathleen, thank you for being our guest. Although you had an overall comfortable stay with us we apologize for having let you down. We have shared your feedback with my housekeeping and maintenance teams in an effort to improve our services moving forward. Please give us another chance to impress you on a future date.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I took more than 30 minutes to register and make reservations with an agent. Because I was paying for the room and wasn't going to be there at check in for my parents, the agent said it will be OK. However, just to double check, I called again the day of check in. The front desk lady informed me that I need to be present, but because I wasn't able to she placed me on hold and spoke with the manager. Then, she told me as long as my parents can show a credit/debit card, they can HOLD the car and charge MY card after they check in. However, my parents card was charged regardless during check in. The person at the front desk was rude and kept telling me there's nothing she can do and I need to come in the next day to speak with whoever I spoke with earlier that day. I was and am

This is standard industry practice, and we require this on every reservation, including pre-paid reservations made through third party websites. If you are still in doubt, please contact our General Manager to further discuss your charges. Thank you again for being our guest, and we hope you will consider giving us another chance to make a better impression in the future.

Summary: Staying a Stay America I had the best time, great employees, everyone is so nice and friendly. If I ever come back up here for work or vacation I will definitely choose this Hotel again. This was a great experience and I enjoyed every second of it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Extended Stay America. Our entire staff works hard to attain our guest’s satisfaction in every possible way, and we admire you recognizing their efforts. We look forward to impressing you again whenever your travels bring you back here.  Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary: I really enjoyed staying at this hotel. Very clean and nice . I got there very early because I had booked a super early flight. I asked if they were able to check me in. The girl at the desk was very nice and she looked and upgraded my room so I could check in early. That was a blessing because I didn't have a car so I didn't have anywhere else to go. I got to my room and it was nice and clean. I really enjoyed staying here. Staff is super nice and courteous. And I loved the fact that they have toiletries for free if you ask. Thank you for a great stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review so future travelers can read about your pleasant experience here at Extended Stay America. We are glad to read that you liked our well-kept property, courteous associates who took great care of you, as well as your clean & comfortable room. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I booked based on my experience with another Extended Stay property in San Diego that was fantastic. I was lured by good rate, convenience to the airport, free parking, free WiFi and free breakfast.   I should have read the ratings and seen the number of "stars". Beware!!  The breakfast consists of packages of instant oatmeal... that you take back to your own microwave, packaged muffins and granola bars. OK... "grab and go" as they say. I could also grab cooked oatmeal and fresh fruit and yogurt.    The room is ugly, uncarpeted, with no floor rugs, and there is a horrible odor of male cologne that I can't get rid of. I have reported the smell and no one seems to care about it. I was handed some fabric Fabreeze which does nothing to stop the smell in the air. At least one light
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. The incidents you highlighted in your review are very concerning and we regret the inconvenience they caused. This is not the type of service our hotel is known for, and we extend our apologies. Please be assured that we are taking steps to ensure we are well poised to serve you better during your next stay. We are confident you will have a much more positive experience on a return visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Found a gem at the front desk
Summary: The rooms are comfortable and the staff is friendly.. There is one shining star among the staff... Caitlin... She is amazing... I stay there often and she remembers my name, remembers what room i stayed in last visit, and asks me if I would like the same room.. She is not there enough in my opinion..She gives Ritz Customer Service.. You heard right... Ritz Customer Service... I would like to have a better breakfast choice other than Oatmeal and Granola Bars.. And use some air fresheners in the hallways as smelling peoples cooking is not appealing to me... No Wolfgang Pucks staying there that's for sure.. Other than that no complaints.
Manager Response: Ange, thank you for being loyal towards Extended Stay America and for sharing your experience. We are glad to know you had a good time here and were impressed with the service provided by Caitlin. Your compliments will be shared with her for a job well done. We also appreciate your observation and have taken a note of the same. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to your return visit soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Nice room, friendly staff, and good price for the location in Orange County.  Hotel is well located with quick and easy access to John Wayne/Orange County airport and the 405 and provides plenty of free self parking.  Also close to Fashion Island and the Irvine area.
Manager Response: Patrick, thank you for sharing your wonderful review of Extended Stay America. We are delighted to read our location was ideal for your trip and that you enjoyed our courteous service as well as the great value we offer. Your feedback is much appreciated, and we hope to be your hotel of choice every time you visit this area.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Don't be fooled by the fact that people say it's in a good location because I've been to other hotels that are cheaper and are in better areas. The room smells bad and the bathroom always smells like smoke cigarettes which doesn't go. The breakfast is just a drink and a snack which isn't a breakfast to me. The whole point was the kitchen and even the hob was so weak and took an hour to boil some water. Pillows were so flat that my neck started to become stiff. Don't even provide proper toilet amenities just a bar of soap. The windows were very stiff too and being in a hot country keeping the air con on is a must however it gave off a sickly smell I couldn't keep it on. The lighting was also very poor - not all the lights worked and the ones that did were very weak. Some staff

We hope you will consider giving us another opportunity so that we can regain your confidence in us.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: We've been staying here at John Wayne for six months off and on. The hospitality here is more comfortable than any of the other Extended Stays I've stayed at over the last 6 months. Russell is a hell of a manager. Finding a way to get us a room when they are full and we forgot to book for the week. Maricela is one of the kindest girls managing to make sure we have everything we need to accommodate. They were awesome team. Keep the hotel clean make sure you have dishes and towels all the time upon request. And they are fun to talk to. I recommend this extended stay over all others in the area. Thank you I will be sad to go stay in Long Beach. Which is my next venture I will definitely be keeping in touch.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. It’s a pleasure knowing you had a great time being with us and loved the outstanding service we provided. I will surely share your compliments with Maricela. We appreciate you recommending us and look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: The room had a nasty musty smell.  The pillows were flat and hard.  You could hear your neighbors footsteps. The "included breakfast" was instant packages of oatmeal down in the lobby with coffee.  The decor was very dowdy too and dated.  Paint work scratched.  Very unpleasant experience which is appropriate for the title of this review.
Manager Response: Susan, we are disheartened to read your review. Please accept our sincere apology for the problems you encountered. You deserved a comfortable and stress-free stay, and we did not live up to your expectations. Your concerns have been shared with every department involved. We hope you and your family will give us a chance to make it up to you.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: This is a wonderful hotel for the price. Very clean, friendly staff and convenient to airport. The grab and go breakfast is minimal, but with the kitchen in the room it was very adequate. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who will be needing a clean, safe place to stay. I was not at the hotel very much so I didn't miss not having a swimming pool.
Manager Response: Laurie, thanks for posting a review so future travelers can read about your pleasant experience here at Extended Stay America - Orange County - John Wayne Airport. It's so nice to read how much you enjoyed your stay, and we are happy you were impressed with our service, suites, and amenities. Thanks again for recommending us, and we look forward to your next visit.    Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Excellent staff. Room was not clean, crumbs from previous tenant Under table, very worn scuffed furniture, paint chipped off walls. Refer doors opened wrong,  Tables were wobbly, Just felt poorly maintained and neglected. Hallways on 4th floor were stained, pile of debris by the elevator for several days.  Expected much better quality based on experience with other properties. But it is the cheapest in the area so take what you can get at this price point but expect to feel like your at a cheap motel.
Manager Response: Jason, we are very sorry your stay did not live up to your and your family’s expectations. We never want any of our guests to leave unhappy. It’s disappointing to know you were not pleased with your room and with our amenities. Your review will be taken as a tool to ensure that all procedures within our housekeeping and maintenance departments are being followed. We hope to have another chance to show you our true hospitality the next time you return to this area.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: breakfast was cheap and makes you wonder why have one at all. No ice machine, terrible smell from food that's being cooked in the rooms...needs better ventilation system in the halls or better exhaust fans in the rooms. Great location close to airport and good restaurants all around.
Manager Response: Pedro, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are sorry you were not completely satisfied with your visit. We receive many positive comments regarding our full-size refrigerator/freezer which includes ice trays, therefore we do not have ice machines on our property. Your concerns regarding the odor issues have been shared with my housekeeping team to take corrective action. We will also make a note of your feedback as we plan any changes to our complimentary grab-and-go breakfast. On a positive note, we are pleased you liked our location. We hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back soon.   Sincerely, General Manager

The 5 days we were there the lobby was never cleaned.  That is something that should be cleaned daily or more.  The front entry doors were so dirty!

I am working with my housekeeping team to make sure all procedures are being followed so this does not happen again. Manager Response: I am sorry for the unpleasant experience you encountered with our service and regret all the inconveniences this caused. Summary: Affordable and decent stay. Clean hotel.  Nice location. Friendly staff. Room request was granted, close to parking and low floor room.  Staff are accommodating and tries to help out on a request. On the go breakfast just enough to put something on my tummy to get through my morning.
Manager Response: Ana, thank you for including Extended Stay America - Orange County - John Wayne Airport in your travel plans. Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: This hotel was very clean, quiet and the rooms were spacious. Having a small kitchen is great. I picked this hotel because it is pet friendly, no matter the size. In the morning there is coffee and muffins to start your day...
Manager Response: Janie, thank you for making Extended Stay America - Orange County - John Wayne Airport a part of your travel plans. We are glad to know you were impressed with our pet-friendly hotel as well as the kitchenette in your room. It was a pleasure having you here, and we hope you will come and see us again soon.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Stay somewhere else. This is bare bones, unclean and unwelcoming. Booked on 3rd party site and believe treated to lower standard.  Spend the extra $10-20 to stay somewhere else and be treated well with the minimum amenities offered.

Summary Heading: Rooms were nice and staff was friendly
Summary: We stayed overnight in this hotel and was pleasantly surprised. The front desk was pleasant and the room was adequate. This hotel would be an excellent choice for those who have an extended stay in the area since there is a kitchen with a full size refrigerator in the room. I would stay here again because they do allow dogs.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Extended Stay America - Orange County - John Wayne Airport. Summary Heading: Reasonable price for location but terrible staff & hotel
Summary: We stayed 5 nights at this extended stay.  If you want to be near Newport Beach & Irvine the price was good. However, the staff was rude and had very little patience.  The outside lawn & trash cans were a mess.  At times it looked like a huge party had taken place. There appeared to be no daily outside maintenance crew.  We stayed Thursday thru Tuesday and were happy to check out early.  Pillows were flat, towels were thin, no ice machine, horrible grab & go breakfast counter. Don't expect a kitchen with hot food.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We're sorry you didn't experience our staff at their best and regret the inconvenience it caused. Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: The outside of motel is very attractive, entrance nice and the desk clerk, Yesenia, is very pleasant and helpful.  The room was clean and the bed comfortable. I immediately went to my room and sent her that email. Four days later and neither a response from her nor a credit to my account has been received. I would avoid this hotel if you can

The basic wifi is 1Mb/sec, with a "premium" 3Mb/sec service, neither of which cannot be fairly described as high speed wifi in 2015. Perhaps speed of 10 times this level would be reasonable, but this is not reasonable. With such a slow speed the wifi was reasonably stable, but it was inadequate for my work and many people wishing to stay a longer period use networks for their work.

Rooms were clean and comfortable and staff helpful.  The only downside is that being unfamiliar with the area I was hesitant to drive more than a couple of miles and one night I didn't have a car.  There wasn't any place within walking distance to eat (Carls Jr. was closed) and no grocery store within walking distance.

So if Internet is not a huge deal to you, I can highly recommend this hotel.

Summary Heading: A friendly hotel for group stay
Summary: Our group has stayed in this hotel for two times. It's a very friendly and clean hotel with good service. Its location is near to UCI, beaches and shopping centers. Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am so ecstatic to know that our staff was professional and able to make you feel relaxed during check-in. Summary: Like i said the last time, Extended Stay America is truly a home away from home. It's a sweet, quiet and clean hotel with very friendly staff members. I had no problems with anything. The only thing I miss is a kitchen for breakfast and dinner at the hotel.  Maybe they could at least come up with selling fruit salad or something that is healthy as well as delicious. There is a Carl's Jr. right next to the hotel however, something inside the hotel would feel more homely and convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your most recent stay. Summary: My lover and I have been visiting John Wayne Airport from the United States for 20 years, staying in hotels & motels throughout the gay district in Orange County. In our opinion Extended Gay is the best accommodation we have ever stayed in. We stayed 11 nights starting Mon 15th October 2014 in unit & found it very clean, roomy, & well hung. Pool deck & dock area very clean with comfortable recliners/chairs that accommodated many of my favorite positions. We met many gays who were returning guests from previous years, always a good sign. Met the owner, Bildo, who was very helpful & are very proud of his resort. To sum up, we will return next year. If you are gay and like saying in hotels, I recommend Extended Gay.

Summary: Very nice staff and great service.  I will definitely stay here again.  It is extremely close to the airport.  It is not fancy but the price is great for the area.  The room includes a stove and fridge.  Parking is free.  Slow wifi is free but you can upgrade to faster wifi for a few dollars.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our fully equipped kitchens and convenient location.  Thank you again for your kind words.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: One word: atrocious.  One star is too many.  See the link below to support the story below:  https://www.dropbox.com/sh/xenhdiicdejp90s/AABOmKINW8spB7gpL7ZKfl18a?dl=0  My wife and I were subjected to a damp smelling room for over a month, and found out towards the end of the stay it was from a water leak. I asked for compensation because of the mold and smell, but they refused any compensation beyond a couple of days.  Terrible customer service when they expect to be paid in full for a terrible and unhealthy room situation. My company will not house people there in the future, and we hope you heed our warning.

Summary: This hotel is okay.  There was mold in the shower stall.  Please note there is NO bathtub.  The towels were in poor condition, except one.  I found someone else's hair on one of the towels.  Gross.  We were informed at check-in that the $25 discount we had would not be applied until after the stay was complete.  The full amount for our stay was charged on Friday when we arrived.  The $25 credit wasn't processed until the following Wednesday.  That's misleading advertising.  I had read the reviews stating no utensils/cups were in the room but it's still annoying/shocking. Tiffany was nice at check in.  However,

On top of that I had strong urge to use the restroom only to find that there was dried poo on the toilet and dried blood on the door. Summary: If your looking for a place just to sleep then this is the place for you. Wi-Fi is included fore free, vending machines are available on the first floor along with a small laundry area with washers and dryers. Maid service is not included.   In the mornings they offer a grab and go breakfast which is granola bars, muffins, fruit, or hot cereal, along with coffee, or hot tea The only place within walking distance to this hotel is a Carl's Jr, which is right next door. Summary Heading: For the Value - excellent center of business area location
Summary: Booked last minute... was not sure about the hotel... arrived late, but for the value it was just great!   I was able to get to my meeting at Newport Beach in just 5 minutes. Location is un-disputable... However, if you need service... do not expect any. What you pay is what you get. It is geared for a longer stay travelers or... whatever. Personally, it had a small kitchen - refrigerator, etc. were perfect. I had only 7 hours stay... including sleep time.  Just left the next early morning - served coffee, choice of granola bars, muffin or... was great for my purpose. But do make sure to ask - if you want non-smoking room upon making reservation...
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice.  Only complaints were minimal-Needed a wastebasket in the bathroom, only had one fork in the kitchen drawer, towels were a bit scratchy. Very quiet, even close to airport.  Staff very responsive. Were able to get into room early.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not the best choice In the area
Summary: Needed a place for just one night and chose this because of the proximity to the airport. And that is the only good thing about this hotel. Sheets were not clean and room was less than perfect. As it was only a night's stay, did not even bother to report.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for five nights. They put us in a smoking room even though we requested non smoking. The entire floor (4th) smelled so bad from smoke that you had to hold your breath. Dogs were barking and the odors were bad. Windows to the outside were hard to open and badly needed cleaning. There is no maid service which we knew but is still a pain. The staff were very pleasant and the location is close to the airport.  I would not recommend this place if you can afford anything else.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: If you believed some of the reviews, you'd think guests thought this was a Marriott or Westin Hotel
Summary: Look, I understand this is Newport Beach and within a 5 mile radius are some really nice places to stay (with an equally nice room rate!), but this place is pretty good.  Free parking and talk about GREAT LOCATION!  I had received a great weekly rate which was UNTOUCHABLE by any of the other 3 star and up hotels.  Know what you're getting with this chain:  NO daily housekeeping, basic hotel services, no restaurant on site.  What you do get is:  larger than usual hotel room, spacious layout, a full kitchen.  If the later features matter to you, then you should consider this property.  If room mate maters to you, they have some AMAZING rates if you stay at least a week!
Manager Response: Thank you for writing such a great review of our hotel.  I'm glad that you enjoyed our free parking and our great location during your stay with us.  As well, it's great to hear that you were pleased with your spacious room and your fully equipped kitchen.  It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Our offices are are across the street so the location is great for us. We have people stay here at least a few times per month. Our clients say the rooms are okay and affordable, but this time we were charged $25 for an early check in fee. Very disappointing since this equals a 25% cost increase.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We pre-purchased our stay for a set price and even confirmed the final price with the hotel. When we arrived we were told that there is a $100 deposit required (unexpected due to never being mentioned by hotel staff over the phone) and the staff claimed it would be automatically released in three business days. Six business days later it had not been released. We had to call our bank so they could call the hotel and receive permission to release the deposit. Also, our room was supposed to be cleaned on Tuesday while we were out. When we came back our room was untouched. We had to go down to the desk where we found out it had been marked clean. They then had to make a note for housekeeping to make sure they cleaned our room the next day. Their grab and go breakfast was a joke.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with details about your stay.  I sincerely apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay.  To make sure this doesn't happen again, I have contacted our marketing team to assure any websites mentioning a pool are removed and will also be working with the staff to assure that if we are unable to provide housekeeping on a scheduled day we do a better job communicating with our guests.  If you would like to discuss this further, please do not hesitate to contact me at laa@extendedstay.com.  Thank you for choosing Extended Stay Hotels. We hope we have the opportunity to see you again in the future.

Summary: You can't beat the price for Newport Beach; however, it's not worth it. Check in took 45 minutes, although the front desk staff was nice, she was unable to quickly serve the people checking in. The room quality was worse than a college dorm room and I would not go barefoot in the room. I checked in and checked out within 2 hours. The clientele was not conducive to a business stay. No amenities; towels and sheets were clean. Stay with the knowledge it is a very convenient location, parking is free; however, I would have rather worked from a Starbucks then in my room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback about your experience.  I apologize that it took so long for you to get checked in when you arrived.  As well, I am sorry that you were not pleased with the overall condition of your room.  Your comments will be very helpful as we continue to improve our guest experience.  Thank you again for your feedback.  We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better stay in the future.

Summary: I chose this hotel because it was so close to the airport and as it was only a very short stay I did not have any expectations. The front desk staff were very friendly and the room was very large. What stood out was how the general manager, Russ, went above and beyond to sort out an issue I had with a local taxi company. I stay in dozens of hotels around the world every year and this experience compelled me to finally join Tripadvisor and write my first review on this hotel. In terms of value for money you cannot beat it and if you happen to meet Russ your stay will definitely be even better!  There is soap in the bathroom but no other amenities. Bathtub and shower and the shower was good. Decent quality bed, two different types of pillows. Plenty of towels. Very good blackout
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  I'm glad that you enjoyed our friendly staff, your spacious room and your fully equipped kitchen during your stay.  As well, it's great to hear that our location was convenient to your travel needs.  Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America.  We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with another comfortable stay soon.

Summary: We only stayed overnight, and here is a quick summary: CHECK IN - a little slow, but not too bad. STAFF - friendly and helpful. We even got a call 30 minutes after check in to ask how everything was...very nice! LOCATION - middle of a business park, but fairly close to restaurants, etc. ROOM - actually pretty nice. Spacious and comfortable with kitchenette, 2 tables/desks and reading chair besides bed and dresser. AMENITIES - not so much. No pool or fitness room. BREAKFAST - not much, but they clearly advertise it as "breakfast on the go" so at least they're honest about it. VALUE - I thought we got a nice room at a reasonable price. If we'd been staying longer the lack of amenities would've been more of an issue. I give it a 4 minus.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time at our hotel and the service our staff provided.  Thank you for choosing Extended Stay Hotels.  We look forward to hosting you again in the future

Summary Heading: Very good value hotel, would stay here again
Summary: Receptionist Yesenia very friendly & told me of the locality. Very good value hotel compared to other hotels close to OC airport. Room with cooker,fridge, microwave, table &chairs.                No shuttle - Taxi estimate to airport $8. If you prefer the exercise you can walk to airport terminal under 20 minutes. No computer to print off boarding pass. Hotel close to shops & sports bar. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  I am glad that you found our staff, especially Yesenia, to be helpful during your visit.  As well, it’s great to hear that you enjoyed our location and your fully equipped kitchen.  Thank you for choosing Extended Stay Hotels.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: Good extended rate for a location close to airport and businesses, but it's rather run-down too.  The bedding is horrible. The sheets had holes in them (multiple sets over a month's time).  The blanket had burn marks and holes (in non-smoking room), and it was thin, flimsy, and slippery.  By morning you generally feel like you've spent th he night in a plastic bag. There is no privacy curtain, so your choice is complete blackout or complete exposure.  The carpet needs cleaning or replacing (as of March 2014).  But again, it's still a good rate and location for a place with a kitchen and laundry.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our hotel.  I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our location, your fully equipped kitchen and our laundry facilities.  Still, I apologize that the condition of your room did not meet your expectations.  I will be meeting with our housekeeping staff to review your comments and to ensure that these issues do not continue in the future.  Once again, thank you for posting your comments.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

Summary: The staff here is really friendly and professional. Maurice was a great help during my stay. The price is good when you compare it to other hotels in this nice area. I would highly recommend it to anyone planning to stay in southern orange county
Manager Response: Jose - Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your stay.  I truly appreciate the kind words about our staff, especially Maurice.  Also, we are very pleased that our great value met your needs.  Thanks again for the feedback.  We look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Price is right if you need to be next to the airport.
Summary: I feel the rates were a bit high for what you get.  Overall, I felt safe, along with my car in the parking lot overnight.  Fairly clean, service was not above and beyond, and the fire alarm pulled twice by an unattended child was disruptive to say the least.  I felt sorry for the tax dollars that were spent on the visit from the fire department.
Manager Response: Monica – I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of our hotel.  Guest safety is a top priority of ours, so I am glad to hear that you felt safe during your stay with us.  Still, I apologize that you were disrupted by the fire alarm twice during your visit.  As well, I am sorry that our staff did not fully meet your expectations.  Your feedback will be useful as we continue to improve our guest experience.  Thank you again for your review.  We look forward to welcoming you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: Stayed here on business for close to 2 months, at $60 per day. Convenient location...close to my office and the Carls Junior, just next door. Average room with thin wall...could hear the conservations in the next room. Old linen but comfortable bed. The tap in the shower was defective and the hair dryer conked off two days before I checked out and didn't get fixed. The weekly housekeeping was missed a couple of times and was done the next day after I informed the front desk staff, every time. Wi-Fi strength was average. How about having an Orange or Apple Juice and some breakfast cereals at the Grab and Go breakfast menu?
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  I’m happy to learn that you enjoyed our great value and convenient location.   Still, I am sorry to hear that our normal cleaning procedures and maintenance policies were not upheld during your stay.  I am working with our staff to improve these issues and make sure it does not affect our future guests.
